TI: [Participation of the hippocampus in regulating a pathologic inactive motor reaction in dogs].
AB: A local pathological inert motor reaction, involving a forced flexion of the forepaw, was formed after simultaneous stimulation with NaCl solution of a part of the tongue brought out to the cheek and electrical stimulation of the forepaw. The reaction decreased (by 70 to 80%) after electrical stimulation of the dorsal hippocampus (beyond CA3). At the same time the animal's emotional stress diminished, as evidenced by the reduced heart rate and a reduced theta-rhythm in the hippocampus.
TT: Uchastie gippokampa v reguliatsii patologicheskoi zastoinoi dvigatel'noi reaktsii u sobak
TA: Zh Vyssh Nerv Deiat Im I P Pavlova
JT: Zhurnal vysshei nervnoi deiatelnosti imeni I P Pavlova
SO: Zh Vyssh Nerv Deiat Im I P Pavlova. 1977 Jan-Feb;27(1):73-80.
